# [Interview #984: Rithmatist Signing Report - Nesh, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=984#4)

#### Brandon Sanderson (paraphrased)

Well all the defense's names are based off of families he knew in Nebraska, and the evil tower is placed where his childhood house would be.

#### Footnote

The evil tower is the Tower of Nebrask.
